name: ExecutionManager
description: ExecutionManager. It allows adding/removing execution strategies for trading on the LooksRare exchange.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a token is locked or the lock on a token is extended. Emitted when `curator` deposited `tokens` on `subgraphDeploymentID` as curation signal. The `curator` receives `signal` amount according to the curation pool bonding curve. An amount of `curationTax` will be collected and burned.

eventDecorators.name: StrategyRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a token is locked or the lock on a token is extended. Emitted when `curator` deposited `tokens` on `subgraphDeploymentID` as curation signal. The `curator` receives `signal` amount according to the curation pool bonding curve. An amount of `curationTax` will be collected and burned.

eventDecorators.name: StrategyWhitelisted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a token is locked or the lock on a token is extended. Emitted when `curator` deposited `tokens` on `subgraphDeploymentID` as curation signal. The `curator` receives `signal` amount according to the curation pool bonding curve. An amount of `curationTax` will be collected and burned.

functionDecorators.name: addStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Add an execution strategy in the system.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: address of the strategy to add.

functionDecorators.name: isStrategyWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Returns if an execution strategy is in the system.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Remove an execution strategy from the system.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: address of the strategy to remove.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: viewWhitelistedStrategies
functionDecorators.description: See whitelisted strategies in the system.

parameterDecorators.name: cursor
parameterDecorators.description: cursor (should start at 0 for first request).
